import React, { useState} from "react" import './Login.css' function Login({setToken}) { const [username, setUsername] = useState() const [password, setPassword] = useState() function handleUsername (e) { e.preventDefault() setUsername(e.target.value) } function handlePassword (e) { e.preventDefault() setPassword(e.target.value) } const handleSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() const token = { username, password } setToken(token) } return(

Login

) } export default Login
